name: Game Design and Development 1 - Solar System
name_original: Game Design and Development 1 - Solar System
description:
Solar system simulation created for the Game Design and Development 1 Course.

The modifications done were the following:

  • Added the following planets:
    • Mercury
    • Venus
    • Mars
    • Jupiter
    • Saturn
    • Uranus
    • Neptune
    • Pluto
  • Added trail renderers to all the planets.
  • Adjusted planets sizes, distances and rotation speeds.
  • Small lighting tweaks.
  • Changed minimap size.
